thread.section_title: LightInTheBox 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 LightInTheBox 的点评意见 | www.lightinthebox.com
thread.title: Rasmus F
thread.title_full: LightInTheBox 的点评人 Rasmus F

author: Rasmus F
title: Rasmus F
text:
Forvent en længere leveringstid (ca. 4 uger), fordi varerne sendes fra udlandet. Købte pakken med laser, batteri og lader til super pris. Desværre var laderen defekt. LightInTheBox svarede indenfor 1 time, at de ville sende en ny uden at skulle have den defekte retur. LightInTheBox sendte oven i købet en helt ny pakke med laser, batteri og lader uden beregning. Super service og super gode priser.
Expect a longer delivery time (approx 4 weeks) because the goods are sent from abroad. Bought a package with laser, battery and charger for super price. Unfortunately the charger was not working. LightInTheBox answered within 1 hour that they would send another having the defect charger returned. LightInTheBox even sent a whole new suite of laser, battery and charger free of charge. Super service and super good prices.
